item.title: Corner of Priory Park Road and Kingsley, 24th January
item.description:
A man has been observed putting out an old shopping card, rubbish and various crates on the corner of Kingsley and Priory Park Road. He is also hanging various rugs , leading to obstruction of the footpath and a very unpleasant esthetic for the neighborhood.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Old commode left on pavement, 24th January
item.description:
This old potty has been on the street for a week or more. Nobody has taken it - although possibly a council collection has been requested? It is not nice to look at. If it could be removed when you are next passing, residents would be grateful. Thanks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cotesbach Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish left in the LTZ planter, 24th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kynaston Road, Hackney, London

item.title: No entry signs worn out, 24th January
item.description:
The no entry signs on the northbound side of Petherton Road where it meets Green Lanes are worn out and no longer legible. Might explain all the e-bikes riding down the wrong side…
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Petherton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
